metadata.dc:author: Fernández González, B
Tejada Artigas, A
Calvo Cebollero, I
Placer Peralta, L
Laperal Mur, J R
González Manzanares, J L
metadata.dc:description: Severe thoracic trauma is a common cause of admission in Intensive Care Units; then heart injury is not a rare finding. We present a case of post-traumatic interventricular dissection and ventricular aneurysm secondary to thoracic trauma caused by traffic accident. We think that ventricular septum injury is a rare finding after chest trauma. Two-dimensional echo-cardiography is an essential procedure in the diagnosis of traumatic heart injury.
metadata.dc:title: Contusión y hematoma en el septo interventricular postraumático. A propósito de un caso.
[Contusion and post-traumatic hematoma of the interventricular septum. Report of a case].
